SEARCH
Package com.app.candidate

Interface CandidateMapper

public interface CandidateMapper
Provides a functional mapping interface for Candidate objects. This interface defines functions that map a Candidate to an Integer, based on specified attributes of the Candidate.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ToIntFunction<Candidate>
    toNumberOfVotes
    Maps a Candidate object to its number of votes.
